All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Enum Summary 
    Class Description
    FailureState
    Enum to represent failures to send back to the user if they attempt certain actions
    GameEnding
    This class represents the screen after the user clicked the "Quit Game" button and (confirm that they really want to quit the game) in Main Menu
    GameStatus
    This class represents the screen after the user clicked the "View Game Status" button in Main Menu
    Gui
    A graphical user interface for a IslandTrader.
    Island
    Class that models an island in the game.
    IslandBuysItem
    This class represents the screen after the user clicked the "See What We Are Buying" button in Visit Island Store Screen
    IslandProperties
    This class represents the screen after the user clicked the "View Island Properties" button in Main Menu
    IslandSellsItem  
    IslandStore
    This class represents the screen after the user clicked the "View Island Store" button in Main Menu
    IslandTrader
    Manages the IslandTrader game, allowing the Player to travel to Islands and trade goods in Stores
    IslandTraderUI
    Defines a user interface (UI) for a IslandTrader.
    Item
    This class implements an Item that a player can buy and sell at stores and have in their cargo bay/s
    ItemType
    Enum to represent the type of item
    ListOption
    Manages a cmd user input request when a choice from a list of objects is being requested.
    Main
    The main method of the game Be default loads the gui, but will load the cmd line if "cmd" is passed as cmd line arguments
    MainCmdUI
    CMD Line UI for IslandTrader, implements the IslandTraderUI Interface
    MainScreen
    This class represents the Main Menu of the game after the user clicked the "Let's Play" button in Setup Screen
    Option
    Manages a cmd user input request to an Option presented Is initialized with the option / question to print to the user and regex to validate the input.
    PastPurchases
    This class represents the screen after the user clicked the "View Past Purchases and Sales" button in Main Menu
    PiratesEncounter
    Class to model if a user encounters pirates during sailing
    Player
    Represents the Player in the game.
    PricedItem
    Represent a Item linked to a price and an PriceType type and the island the Item was transacted on
    PriceType
    Enum to represent the type of transaction a PricedItem might represent
    RandomEvent
    Interface for classes that represent a random event a player might face while sailing a route
    RescueSailors
    Class to model if a user encounters sailors to be rescued during a sailing
    Route
    This class represents a route from an island to another.
    SailingScreen
    This class represents the screen after the player sail to another island
    Screen
    This class represents the main Screen that manages all the calls to other screens of the game
    SetSailingIsland
    This class represents the screen after the user clicked the "Sail To Another Island" button in Main Menu
    SetupScreen
    This class represents the Setup Screen of the game
    Ship
    This class represents a ship that the player uses on their quest
    ShipProperties
    This class represents the screen after the user clicked the "View Ship Properties" button in Main Menu
    StorageList
    Class that models of list of Items of a certain type with methods to check for space remaining and item type checking A ship will have one or more of these lists, at least one for each type of item they have
    Store
    Represents a store on an island, a store has a name and a list of items that can be bought and sold
    UnfortunateWeather
    Class to model if a user encounters bad weather during the sailing
    UpgradeItem
    This class implements an Item that a player can buy to upgrade their ship
    ViewIslandBuysItem
    This class represents the screen after the user clicked the "See What We Buys" button in View Island Properties Screen
    ViewIslandRoutes
    This class represents the screen after the user clicked the "View Routes to This Island" button in View Island Properties Screen.
    ViewIslandSellsItem
    This class represents the screen after the user clicked the "See What We Sells" button in View Island Properties Screen
    World
    This class represents the physical world in our game, the islands, the routes and methods to survey the world.
